channel.title: Vital 3 feet to achievement
channel.description:
Likely everyone here has had those moments where you question carrying on with your plans. I have been needing some motivation lately. Came across this post which was a good encouragement to dig a little deeper and stay the course. Everyone, myself included, wants the quick win but most success comes from persistent plodding.
https://www.artofmanliness.com/articles/vital-3-feet-achievement/

item.title: Vital 3 feet to achievement

The Vital 3 Feet to Achievement by Donald Laird | The Art of Manliness

For many years I have kept a magic rule on my desk. It has literally been worth more than its weight in gold to me.
